# Neurophysiology II

## Resting membrane potential

- Voltage across neuron's membrane, -65-70 mV
- Balance of forces
  - Diffusion
    - High concentration $\rightarrow$ low
  - Electrostatic (+ $\rightarrow$ - and vice versa)
- Dynamic equilibrium
  - Can change when circumstances change
  
## Resting membrane potential

:::: {.columns}
::: {.column width=50%}
- Na+/K+ pump
- Na+ (sodium)
  - Outside >> inside
- K+ (potassium)
  - Inside >> outside
:::
::: {.column width=50%}
